page.title: 11 FARMING AROUND LITCHAM
page.content: This pig farmer,Mr J Wright has lived near Great Dunham for 2 years and has managed a 250 sow unit.He has approximately 2800 pigs including sows,boars,gilts and piglets.He feeds the pigs on a mixture of high protein soya,wheat,barley,concentrates and water,all goes through a propotioner and comes out as cubes.One tonne of food lasts about 3 weeks and costs 377 pounds and lasts about 3 weeks.Altogether there are 4 members including mr Wright who is the manager.Very recently the farm suffered a nasty bought of Transmitable Gastro Eneritis.Each pig when sent for slaughter at 20 weeks fetches about 60 pounds.
